resources.string:
Unfortunately, I am not a wizard!
\ If you find a bug with any of these settings, please contact me on XDA (@Yoshi_Guy) with the following.

1. Logcat or Last_Kmsg
2. Kernel and Mods used
3. Useful information

If you fail to report something, do not expect things to be fixed. Remember, I am not a wizard so I do miss things.
Press on color below to apply
Customize the layout of and options for the recents app screen
Include the foreground task when clearing all recents
Show a Google search bar in the recents screen
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Change the view of the recents screen
Use Slim Recents for recents view
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in the recents view
Show app shortcuts on the opposite edge
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Enable multiple windows on the screen at the same time
Multiple activities on screen at the same time

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Doze pulse will be triggered by pick up gesture sensor events
Pick up gesture sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by significant motion sensor events
Significant motion sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Predefined doze repeat intervals (normally [1s,10s,30s,60s,120s]) will be used (default)
Doze will only pulse once per notification
Brightness level of doze pulse screen (% of max allowed brightness)
Ambient display notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Ambient display notifications will show as inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Change the number of columns displayed on the dashboard
Show dashboard tile titles in 2 lines
Change the state of the dashboard switches
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Change this device\'s DPI to a different size
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Lights in do not disturb mode
Show unaccounted and over-counted usage in battery statistics.
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Configure how apps handle hiding the navigation bar & status bar
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
No need, development settings are enabled by default
Enable the Android Debug Bridge (adb) interface
Display a notification when USB or network debugging is enabled
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Volume down to enter silent mode
Allow volume down to enter do not disturb mode
Volume up to exit do not disturb
Allow volume up to exit do not disturb mode
You don\'t have any blocked numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To prevent phone numbers from calling or messaging you, enable the blocked caller list.
You will not receive incoming calls or messages from phone numbers on the blocked caller list
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid phone number to blocked caller list
Do you want to remove this blocked phone number?
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
This will hide all force close notifications
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all immersive mode messages
Enable notificiation for when the flashlight is on
Show/hide lock screen items and change their colors and fonts
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Change the default font of the lock screen clock widget
Change the shortcuts on the bottom lock screen corners
Change the shortcuts on the middle of the lock screen
Change or clear the lock screen wallpaper
Long-press power button with screen off to turn on torch
Configure settings for the weather, calendar, and time widget (LockClock)
Enable media cover art on the lock screen
Display the number of pending notifications
Select what notifications you want to "breath" in the status bar
This will give your SMS notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
This will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
This will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
Swipe three fingers to take a screenshot
Double tap lock screen to sleep
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to turn off the display
Double tap status bar to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Enable vibration when opening the bottom right lock screen shortcut with a double tap of the power button
Configure options for hardware keys and the volume rocker
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Back\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Reassigning "Home" button or longpress "Home" is not permitted !\n\nThis would make your device unusable!
Reassigning "Back" button is not permitted !\n\nThis would make your device unusable!

You may not remove the "Home" button action,
it has been readded as last entry!

This would make your device unusable!

You may not remove the "Back" button action,
it has been readded as last entry!

This can make your device unusable!
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
When screen is off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks
Volume rocker wake must be disabled
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Configure a battery bar on either the navbar or status bar
Enable to animate the battery bar while charging
Configure options for notifications in the status bar
Configure what icons are shown on the status bar
Adjust screen brightness by sliding across the status bar
Hide or change the appearance of the status bar clock & date
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display the Turbo logo in the status bar
Customize a weather temperature indicator in the status bar
Customize items in the Quick Settings panel
Enable the brightness slider in the Quick Settings panel
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Two main tiles on the first row
Enable advanced settings in the location tile in Quick Settings
Show weather in the Quick Settings panel header
Enable custom Quick Settings panel header images
Enable to use Polygraphic HD header images
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Choose which options appear in the global menu
Include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery and bootloader
Configure the entries to show in power menu (up to 6)
Customize the options and items in the navigation bar
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in landscape on the bottom
Configure the buttons to show on navigation bar
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Reset all style entries to default?
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing. Longpress to navigate up/down. Overrides IME switcher and menu buttons
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Double tap navigation bar to sleep
Double tap on the navigation bar to turn off the display
